sentences.english: Though fortune does be pleasing I 'll go along with you.
sentences.chinese: 我心傷悲，命運弄人，與汝同殤。
我是如此崇敬汝之神性。

sentences.english: Its support and contribution played a great role in prospering the Wei Kingdom (one kingdom in the period of Three-Kingdoms).
sentences.chinese: 汝潁大族的支持和貢獻對曹魏的強盛起著重要的作用。

sentences.english: I am your Angel of Music.
You shall not kill other players, except PVP, Battle ground or Arena.
sentences.chinese: 汝不可殺玩家，除非是在PVP，戰場或競技場。

sentences.english: This is what I give you the most evil of the toxin , and most sweet gift.
sentences.chinese: 這是吾賦予汝之最邪惡的毒素，也是最甜美的饋贈。

sentences.english: Sheldon:Ah, gravity, thou are a heartless bitch.
sentences.chinese: 啊，地心引力，汝乃無良之婊子。

sentences.english: It was from this paradise that Monseigneur Welcome had passed to the other.
sentences.chinese: 卞福汝主教便是從這個天堂渡到那個天堂去的。

sentences.english: "I like that name," said he. "Bienvenu makes up for the Monseigneur."
sentences.chinese: “我喜歡這名稱，”他說，“卞福汝賽過主教大人。”

sentences.english: The isles of Greece, the isles of Greece!
I like that name, " said he. "Bienvenu makes up for the Monseigneur. "
sentences.chinese: “我喜歡這名稱，”他說，“卞福汝賽過主教大人。”

sentences.english: Wake up, thou'rt selfless and free.
The next morning at sunrise Monseigneur Bienvenu was strolling in his garden.
sentences.chinese: 次日破曉，卞福汝主教在他的園中散步。

sentences.english: Do you believe money is everything?

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
I (first person pronoun used by royalty or nobility)
